alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Wasco (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued July 23 at 12:13PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT MONDAY... Oregon Department of Environmental Quality has issued an Air Quality Advisory...in effect until 11 PM PDT Monday. A Smoke Air Quality Advisory has been issued. Smoke from the Simnasho fire and other wildfires burning in the region combined with forecasted conditions will cause air quality to reach unhealthy levels, especially in Jefferson County and the Warm Springs Reservation. Pollutants in smoke can cause burning eyes...runny nose...aggravate heart and lung diseases...and aggravate other serious health problems. Limit outdoor activities and keep children indoors if it is smoky. Please follow medical advice if you have a heart or lung condition. For additional information...please visit the Web site at http://www.oregon.gov/DEQ
